verses.name: Joel 3:7
verses.text: Behold, I will raise them out of the place whither ye have sold them, and will return your recompence upon your own head:

verses.name: Joel 3:8
verses.text: And I will sell your sons and your daughters into the hand of the children of Judah, and they shall sell them to the Sabeans, to a people far off: for the Lord hath spoken it.

verses.name: Joel 3:9
verses.text: Proclaim ye this among the Gentiles; Prepare war, wake up the mighty men, let all the men of war draw near; let them come up:
